items.title: Irankunda and Toure give Socceroos a World Cup headache after dazzling against NZ
items.standfirst: Mohamed Toure and Nestory Irankunda dazzle after being handed a rare opportunity to start under Tony Popovic as the Socceroos retain the 'Soccer Ashes' with a commanding win over New Zealand in Auckland.
items.content: Mohamed Toure and Nestory Irankunda dazzle after being handed a rare opportunity to start under Tony Popovic as the Socceroos retain the 'Soccer Ashes' with a commanding win over New Zealand in Auckland.

ai_summary: Irankunda and Toure performed well for the Socceroos.
The Socceroos retained the 'Soccer Ashes' title.
They had a commanding win over New Zealand.
They were given a rare starting opportunity.
The match took place in Auckland.
